divs: Sighting DetailsA light appeared low on the horizon above the tree line of the distant hills in Medford in the south western sky. The light would go from dim to bright in about 2 seconds. It would then dart around a bit from side to side and up and down then fade out. This happened over a period of about an hour and a half or so in various locations, but all were roughly about the same altitude. I heard no airplane sounds of helicopter sounds associated with the lights. The number of times it appeared and dissappeared was about 4 to 5 times. Anyone else in Medford see this?
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around June 16th 2009
